# simdWorldOrientation

**Instance Property**

The node’s orientation relative to the scene’s world coordinate space.

## Declaration

```swift
var simdWorldOrientation: simd_quatf { get set }
```

## Discussion

This quaternion isolates the rotational aspect of the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/simdWorldTransform] matrix, which in turn is the conversion of the node’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/simdTransform] from local space to the scene’s world coordinate space. That is, it expresses the difference in axis and angle of rotation between the node and the scene’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNScene/rootNode].

## Related Documentation

- **worldOrientation**: The node’s orientation relative to the scene’s world coordinate space.

## Managing Transforms in World Space

- **simdWorldTransform**: The world transform applied to the node.
- **simdWorldPosition**: The node’s position relative to the scene’s world coordinate space.
